description:
Mayuko and Yuri reunite on top of a skyscraper amidst a grenade attack. Now held hostage, Rika is summoned before a God Candidate.
Source: netflix

titles.title: I`ve Cast Off My Humanity, But That`s Fine
J`ai renoncé à mon humanité, sans regrets
Ningen o Sute Chatta... kedo Sore Demo Ii
人間を捨てちゃった... けどそれでもいい
